title: Microsoft Buys Activision Blizzard in $69 Billion Game Deal
itunes:title: Microsoft Buys Activision Blizzard in $69 Billion Game Deal
description:
Dr. Tom McGinn, Executive Vice President of Physician Enterprise at CommonSpirit Health, discusses how the omicron outbreak is impacting the nation's hospitals. Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Software & IT Services Analyst Anurag Rana reports on Microsoft agreeing to buy Activision Blizzard in a $68.7 billion deal to create the world’s third-biggest gaming company. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News P&I Reporter Peter Robison talk about Peter's Businessweek Magazine story Progressive Real Estate Firm Faces Accusations of Discrimination. Bloomberg News Wall Street Reporter Sonali Basak breaks down Goldman Sachs earnings. And we Drive to the Close with Marci McGregor, Senior Investment Strategist at Bank of America Private Bank.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
